item.title: Bulletin updated at 12:05 HKT 11/08/2022
item.description:
At noon at the Hong Kong Observatory :
Air temperature : 27 degrees Celsius
Relative Humidity : 93 per cent
During the past hour the mean UV Index recorded at King's Park : 2
Intensity of UV radiation : low

Areas of thundery showers continue to develop around Hong Kong. Showers will be heavier at times with squally thunderstorms over the territory in the next few hours. Members of the public should be on the alert.

Violent gusts reaching 90 kilometres per hour or above may affect Eastern Waters of Hong Kong. Members of public should seek safe shelter immediately.

Please be reminded that:
The Thunderstorm Warning has been issued. It will remain effective until 2:00 p.m. today. A few severe squally thunderstorms are expected to occur over Hong Kong.
